perturbation.original_text:
7.  DATA PROTECTION & PRIVACY
7.1
All rights to the personal and traffic data related to ELEPHANT TALK Customers which ELEPHANT TALK places at the disposal of T-
Mobile, as well as to the results of the T-Mobile registering and processing of this data, shall rest in ELEPHANT TALK. T-Mobile shall
have at its disposal data covered by the Agreement only to the extent and as long as necessary for T-Mobile to fulfill its obligations
pursuant to this Agreement.
7.2
Both Parties confirm that they shall comply with the Data Privacy regulations and laws applicable in the Netherlands and internationally,
including the Dutch Data Protection Act (“Wet Bescherming Persoonsgegevens”), as amended or varied from time to time. T-Mobile
undertakes to process personal data only for the purpose of this Agreement.
7.3
***. T-Mobile will refrain from using any ELEPHANT TALK Customer related data for any other purpose than providing the Hosting
Services to ELEPHANT TALK, with the exception of:
·
legal tapping requirements in accordance with a request from the relevant public body; and
·
necessary use for the purposes of preventing, tracing and fighting fraud or irregularities; and
·
other activities required by law.
perturbation.changed_text:
7.  DATA PROTECTION & PRIVACY
7.1
All rights to the personal and traffic data related to ELEPHANT TALK Customers which ELEPHANT TALK places at the disposal of T-
Mobile, as well as to the results of the T-Mobile registering and processing of this data, shall rest in ELEPHANT TALK. T-Mobile shall
have at its disposal data covered by the Agreement only to the extent and as long as necessary for T-Mobile to fulfill its obligations
pursuant to this Agreement.
7.2
Both Parties confirm that they shall use commercially reasonable efforts to comply with Data Privacy regulations applicable in the Netherlands and internationally, T-Mobile may process personal data beyond the purpose of this Agreement.
7.3
***. T-Mobile will refrain from using any ELEPHANT TALK Customer related data for any other purpose than providing the Hosting
Services to ELEPHANT TALK, with the exception of:
·
legal tapping requirements in accordance with a request from the relevant public body; and
·
necessary use for the purposes of preventing, tracing and fighting fraud or irregularities; and
·
other activities required by law.
perturbation.explanation: This change weakens the consumer data privacy clause, which is a violation of consumer rights. By adding 'commercially reasonable efforts' and removing specific mention of the 'Dutch Data Protection Act', the contract introduces ambiguity and allows T-Mobile more leeway in processing personal data, against consumer protection laws like GDPR which are applicable in the EU and Netherlands.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and Dutch Data Protection Act (implementing GDPR)
